p.n: Game 5: Boston survives Kobe Bryant's historic offensive run to take 3-2 lead
p.k: Kobe Bryant's 38 points weren't enough to hold off the Celtics from winning Game 5 of the 2010 NBA Finals

p.n: Game 7: Lakers beat Celtics in latest chapter of storied history
p.k: The Los Angeles Lakers overcome a 13-point deficit in the third quarter to send the Boston Celtics packing in Game 7 of the 2010 NBA Finals
Russell Westbrook hit a jumper with 18.7 seconds left, finishing with 35 points as the Oklahoma City Thunder remained unbeaten with an 85-83 victory

p.n: Mavericks/Spurs, 2006 Western Conference Semifinals - Game 7 - Popcast
p.k: Added pop up facts throughout the game in which Tim Duncan led all scorers with 41 points but it wasn't enough to overcome Dirk Nowitzki, 37 points
Nick Van Exel scored 40 points off the bench and Steve Nash had 31 to lead four Dallas players with at least 20 points as the Mavericks defeated the Kings

p.n: Shaqtin' a Fool: Best of the Decade
